attributes.action: allow full freedom of speech for all indigenous British nationals without limitations or hinderance
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
allow full freedom of speech for all  British indigenous nationals without limitations or hinderance as now imposed upon them by illegal restrictive laws limiting free speech.

The repeal of all laws imposed by this government censoring speech, thought and the written word since gaining power in 1997, and the full acceptance of indigenous British people to speak, think and write freely on any subject without interference by this government or their successors, no matter the subject or material.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
